name: zoome TDKI
summary:
Let's enjoy fascinating Vocaloid videos posted by a lot of creators!
This application is for Japanese language only and all of the contents
are in Japanese.
zoome TDKI lets you enjoy Vocaloid videos on your Android.
Anytime, anywhere, you can view a variety of Vocaloid videos, and
check the latest posts and the most popular videos.
*Your device needs supporting "H.264 (Baseline@L1.3 profile) video format".
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 开发者: zoome Co.,Ltd.
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=jp.co.zoome.zoomeTDKI
